name: Kishi
description: The Kishi is a medium-sized fiend with two heads, exceptional Dexterity and Charisma, and a chaotic evil nature. Its weapon attacks are magical and it deals additional cold damage.
memorable: The Kishi's ability to summon allies and manipulate others with its spells makes it a cunning adversary in combat.
goals: To spread chaos and dominate weaker beings, often through deceptive means.
relations: Kishi often work alongside other fiends and can summon giant hyenas or even other Kishi.
environment: Typically encountered in dark, chaotic realms or locations steeped in evil.
strengths: Its dual-headed nature grants it advantages against charm and blindness effects, alongside high resistances to nonmagical damage.
weaknesses: Relies heavily on its magical abilities, making it vulnerable to powerful spellcasters.
attacks: Makes multiattack with one bite and two spear strikes, with additional cold damage on successful hits.
most_powerful_ability: Can cast spells like dominate person, allowing it to control others in combat.
equipment: Equipped with fiendish weapons that deal both piercing and cold damage.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet and advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks.
skills: Skilled in Deception and Performance, using its Charisma to manipulate and deceive.
additional_information: Immune to poison and poisoned conditions.
Magic Resistance grants advantage on spell saving throws.
Can absorb essence from slain foes to enhance its defense.
Ability to summon allies that share its resistances.
Utilizes magical weapon attacks that increase damage output.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like detect evil and good, suggestion, and dominate person, using Charisma.
test_queries: summoner of giant hyenas and demons
cunning monster with magical weapon attacks
